Content: The part inventory is the highlighted area in the image.
The inventory shows all the parts organized in categories.
You can select these categories by clicking the buttons above the inventory.
In the inventory, the cost of the parts is displayed at the top
below the cost, you can see how many of the part you own.
If you click on a part that is currently not available (x0) in your inventory, you buy it.
else, you can click the part and place it
